001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.annotations;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.authentication.BaseAuthenticationClient;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.authentication.Credentials;
005import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
006import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
007import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
008import java.lang.annotation.Target;
009
010/**
011 * Defines API authentication parameters for test execution.
012 *
013 * <p>This annotation specifies the authentication credentials and client type
014 * required for executing API tests.
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
019@Target(ElementType.METHOD)
020public @interface AuthenticateViaApi {
021
022   /**
023    * Specifies the credentials class providing authentication details.
024    *
025    * @return The class implementing {@link Credentials}.
026    */
027   Class<? extends Credentials> credentials();
028
029   /**
030    * Specifies the authentication client responsible for handling authentication.
031    *
032    * @return The class extending {@link BaseAuthenticationClient}.
033    */
034   Class<? extends BaseAuthenticationClient> type();
035
036   /**
037    * Determines whether authentication credentials should be cached.
038    *
039    * @return {@code true} if credentials should be cached, otherwise {@code false}.
040    */
041   boolean cacheCredentials() default false;
042
043}
